short_description: ambassador vietnam is a lighting store based in hồ chí minh city, vietnam.
long_description: leading signage, solar lighting & led lighting manufacturer in vietnam. ambassador signage & lighting is one of the top manufacturers of bespoke, premium way - finding, architectural signage systems, energy saving, maintenance free led fixtures ( indoor & outdoor), decorative stainless steel sheets and solar lighting solutions. we are head quartered in canada, and operate across canada, europe, middle east, sub - continent, vietnam & cambodia. core products/services from ambassador vietnam design ,build,installation service for architectural signage. design,build,installation service for façade lighting. design ,build,installation service for landscape lighting. design, build, installation service for digital signage systems. * design, build, installation service for led display – indoor & outdoor * ambassador ambient/decorative lighting. *ambassador stainless sheets. *ambassador cast metal tiles. *ambassador cast sinks.
business_tags: solar lighting | signage & wayfinding | digital signage systems | landscape light | led module | lighting fixture | signage lighting | led display | signage systems | led fixtures | vietnam & cambodia | stainless steel sheet | installation | design build
generated_description: ambassador international - signage & lighting is a leading signage, solar lighting, and led lighting manufacturer based in vietnam. with over four decades of experience, the company specializes in designing, consulting, and manufacturing premium wayfinding and architectural signage projects worldwide. they also offer corporate branding campaign programs involving sophisticated signage and logo projects. ambassador lighting is known for its expertise in lighting design, consultation, and project-based manufacturing of outdoor lighting fixtures, focusing on durability and quality-based approaches. the company is recognized as one of the world's top signage manufacturers and is committed to delivering the best quality and value to the signage industry. they are also a leading contractor for award-winning lighting fixtures and facade lighting solutions.
